resources.string: Your baby is now perfectly safe
Please select the message to play when your baby wakes up or record a new one.
Recording in progress! Press the mike button again to stop.
Do you really want to delete?
No monster detected yet! Launch a new watch during your baby sleep!
Do you want to listen to your message?
For your baby safety, the watch can\'t be launched on your smartphone if it\'s not on Airplane mode. Do you want to access the airplane menu selection to activate it?
You\'re leaving the Watch mode, please do not leave your phone near your baby. Your can now de-activate the Airplane mode. Press Yes to access the Airplane menu selection.
Watch out, all the app datas will be deleted, including monsters and events history. Do you really want to proceed?
Please name your message (for example mom)
Do not forget to de-activate the Airplane mode to access your phone calls again"

This monster is a real deal. It has terrified so many children over the years that scientists gave its name to a panik attack symptom. If your child survive its encounter, You can be sure he won\'t be afraid of anything ever.

It always strikes where and when you don\'t expect it, with a deeply asleep victim, in total darkness. Some say that children who encountered it cried so loud that they were heard from many blocks away.
It likes to play it tough but its ginger bread head do not works in its favor. Most children think it\'s a wubby!
it may appear at every hour of the day but rarely at night. It provokes mild screaming from children (they even sometimes laugh!).
Its multiple branches sing frightening songs. If you hear music coming from your baby\'s room, it might not be his mobile!
The root beast lives during the night and is attracted by light.
It nourrishes from children\'s dreams. Their nightmares are its candies. If you encounter it in your baby\'s room, do not, under any circumstances, touch it!
It appears at night when your child is deeply asleep. Once your baby is awaken, it dashes off quickly.
Watch out! Take good care! In spite of its appearance, this monster is not a nice one. Always hungry, it eats everything it can find.
It usually appears during the day at meal time. Beware of the digestion nap!
As a very curious creature, it sticks its only eye everywhere. It\'s very hard to get rid of!
It appears at every hour of the day or night, as long as light is on. Usually, children are not really scared of it.
It is a master in the art of disguise. When was the last time you took a look under your bed?
It is there, everytime and everywhere, so much so that children have gotten use to it. Most of the time, the cries linked to it are weak.
It stays lurking in the dark watching children for hours. Deep down, it likes them (in an affectionate way). It sometimes fantasizes it is a giant teddy bear cuddled by a child\'s loving arms.
Mostly shy, it lives in the dark and only comes out at night.
This terrifying monster is gigantic. It nevertheless usually stays unseen thanks to its ability to crawl on walls like lizards. Have you ever look up at the ceiling before leaving your baby\'s room ?

It appears at every hour of the day, even in bright daylight! The screamings it provokes can be very intense. It usually walks in company of its eyeblob bush. Watch out if you stumble on it, it might attack you with eyeballs!
Undoubtedly the most lovable monster! It is so scared of children that, when it sees one, it bursts into tears. Don\'t be too harsh on it if you cross its path, it is harmless.
It usually gets out when everybody sleeps. It is attracted by nightlights for they comfort it. Keep in mind that if it woke your baby, it surely didn\'t do it on purpose!
Beware, this monster tries to pass for you! Its favorite hobby : cuddling, hugging, petting. But when the baby realizes it\'s not you, he usually gets very angry.

It likes to get out before naptime or during the evening for it fantasizes that it can help the baby to go to sleep. It also likes to take over from the other monsters in hope to comfort the weeping babies.
It shines in the night. The children are drawn to its light and this is probably the most fearful threat.
It appears in total darkness, day or night. You will probably want to open up the blinds quickly, won\'t you?
Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history
The screen will turn off during the Watch. Advisable if you want your baby to sleep in a dark room or if you want to save your battery
Welcome to BabyboOH ! \n\n Our monster hunting team will watch over your baby during his sleep.
Before starting, we\'d like to know a little more about your little one. Is it...
What a lovely name for a lovely girl!
According to our experts team analysis, it seems that %1$s are great adventurers. With our help, she should be able to come around any night creature!

According to our experts team analysis, it seems that %1$s are very pretty princesses. While waiting for prince charming, she\'ll need a little help from us to strike down the monters inhabiting her room!
What a lovely name for a lovely boy!
According to our experts team analysis, it seems that %1$s are great adventurers! With our help, he should be able to come around any night creature!

According to our experts team analysis, it seems that %1$s are very bright and sensitive boys. While waiting for him to create his own monster busting machine, he\'ll need a little help from us to strike down the monters hiding under his bed!
You just have to record the message that will be played to %1$s and we\'ll have everything we need to watch over %2$s while he sleeps!
Press \"continue\" to record the message rightaway or press \"main menu\" to reach app homepage and record the message later.
Please enter your baby gender to continue
Please enter your baby\'s name to continue
%1$s woke up once during the last watch. A monster was detected! Please connect to the log journal to learn more!
%1$s woke up once during the last watch. A monster was detected! Please connect to the log journal to learn more!
%1$s woke up several times during the last watch over. At least one monster was detected! Please connect to the log journal to learn more!
%1$s woke up several times during the last watch. At least one monster was detected! Please connect to the log journal to learn more!
Keep on using BabyboOH with your baby. This monster might appear again during the next nap!
Press the mike button to start recording
Recording in progress! Press the mike button again to stop
Pic of the Monster who woke your baby
Released monster pic. Click to visualize its ID
Adjust the mike sensitivity during the watch to prevent too frequent or too seldom sets off
Enter the awaken lapse of time after which you want the song to be played
A reading is already in progress
%1$s has been awakened by a frightening monster named %2$s! Thank you BabyboOH for helping me looking after my baby !
%1$s has been awakened by a frightening monster named %2$s! Thank you BabyboOH for helping me looking after my baby !
To finish we have to calibrate your microphone. To do that you must necessary be in a quiet place.You will have the possibility of calibrating again your microphone later.
Press the button to start the microphone calibrating
Be silent... the calibrating is in progress
The calibrating is achieved. You can now use BabyboOH with your baby!

BabyboOH is an application that enables you to watch over your baby’s sleep in a most pleasant way. But it cannot be used as a substitute to parental watch over. Don’t let your baby cry. Don’t let your baby alone.

BabyboOH has been developed by Nicolas Boutin. Grateful thanks to Blandine for her support and her precious advices, to my sister Geraldine for her final read-through and for the english translation, to my brother Jérôme for the monster design. Particular thanks to Mahel for her fruitful discussions and her support in an hostile territory. \n\nThe full or partial duplication of this application is strictly forbidden.
Press again to stop the song.
Each time your baby wakes up, a quiet melody will be played until he falls back asleep. You will even be able to record your own soothing message in our private recording room!
For each event, our experts will analyse your baby cries and environment to diagnose which monster woke him up!
